name: Apothecaria Alpha 0.1 demo
description:
Hello and welcome to Apothecaria, the game where you run your own potion shop!

    This is the demo for Alpha 0.1.  In-game you will find 1 plant, 1 monster, 1 sound, 2 ingredients, 1 old man with old man problems, and 1 potion you can make.   The game is currently very bare-bones but I look forward to hearing your impressions!

UPDATE:

    Fixed the game crashing due to a C# library bug, the current download should run correctly.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys / WASD:  Move

Z:  Action/Accept

X:  Cancel

Esc:  Open menu

There's also controller support!

BUGS:

1.  The menu is unfinished but still navigable.

2.  The  Boarfullo can knock you inside of a wall.  If you are stuck open the menu and return to title screen, you will keep your collected/crafted items until the application is closed (this includes if you die).

If you have any questions, comments, or discover another bug please let me know in the comments!

Have fun!

P.S.  I made most 3D textures gradients but the ingredient box is pixelated.  Tell me which style you like more!
